verses.roman:
āra dina mahāprabhu hañā sāvadhāna
rātre uṭhi' gaṇa-saṅge kaila prātaḥ-snāna

synonyms: āra dina—the next day; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; hañā—becoming; sāvadhāna—very careful; rātre uṭhi'-getting up at night; gaṇa-saṅge—with His personal devotees; kaila—took; prātaḥ-snāna—bathing early in the morning.
translation: The next day, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu and His personal associates got up in the dark and attentively took their early morning baths.
